original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields up in mid-day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were up at mid-day trade on Tuesday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was trading at 32.00/25 percent, up from 31.75/32.00 percent on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was trading at 28.25/30 percent, also up from 28.00/10 percent on Monday. (Colombo/ Mar 14/2023)
